extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Game.CityQueue
      A CityQueue class that implements a priority queue for the cities to be used for the path finding algorithm above
      (package private) class  Game.CityQueueObj
      City queue object that stores the city, it's distance from the starting city and the previous city it's connected to in the shortest route

      • getShortestRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getShortestRoute(RouteCard rc,
                                                   java.lang.String colour)
        Get the shortest route between the two cities on a route card
        Parameters:
        rc - the route card that specifies the two cities to go between
        colour - the colour of the player to check routes against
        Returns:
        A list of routes between neighbouring cities that connect the two cities on the route card

      • getShortestRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getShortestRoute(java.lang.String cityA,
                                                   java.lang.String cityB,
                                                   java.lang.String colour)
        Get the shortest route between two cities, implemented using Djikstra's algorithm
        Parameters:
        cityA - the name of the starting city
        cityB - the name of the ending city
        colour - the colour of the player to check routes against
        Returns:
        A list of routes between neighbouring cities that connect the two cities on the route card

                                java.lang.String colour)
